mapper.select: SELECT bt.id, bt.title, ct.company_name, ct.id company_id FROM BOARD_TB bt inner join company_tb ct on bt.company_id = ct.id
SELECT bt.id, bt.title, bt.career, ct.id company_id, ct.company_name, ct. company_scale, ct.company_field FROM BOARD_TB bt inner join company_tb ct on bt.company_id = ct.id where bt.id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into board_tb (company_id, title, content, career, created_at) values(#{companyId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{career}, now())
